snippet: As one of the world's most wired societies, South Korea has embraced the Web, but a recent crackdown on Internet freedom has drawn accusations of censorship. Read more »
abstract: As one of the world's most wired societies, South Korea has embraced the Web, but a recent crackdown on Internet freedom has drawn accusations of censorship. Read more »

headline.main: Korea Policing the Net. Twist? It's South Korea.
